title: The Great Land of Small
brief_description: Tonight, in a quiet forest, Jenny and David are about to embark on a mystical, magical adventure. Aided by Fritz, a kindly hobbit like creature, they are about to enter the enchanted World of Small. Once inside, the kids discover the Kingdom of Small is a place of beauty and wonder and happiness, where no one grows old. Unfortunately, Jenny and David are told that they cannot return home and only Fritz’s special magic can help them. Rated: G
